page.title: 20THANK YOU:ASHLEWORTH
page.content:
Ashleworth School wish to thank all those people who have given us so much help with the B.B.C. Project.These people include the local Vicar,our retired Vicar,the Policeman,the Postmistress,the Licencees, Women's Institute,local Farming Community,Gloucester College of Art and Technology,School Governors, {Parents,Friends}and especially the {Children:} DAVID EMMA WILLIAM STEVEN NEIL SARAH D. SARAH S. RACHAEL JOANNE MICHAEL TIMOTHY EMILY
THANK YOU ONE AND ALL. Anne Turner. Head Teacher
